attributes.action: Call a national enquiry into organised gang rape of British girls in UK cities.
attributes.additional_details: Because it must never be allowed to happen again and those guilty must be held to account to the full extent of the law.
attributes.background: Fully investigate the how why and who of the failures that allowed this to happen and continue to happen unchecked.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
